title: Mostar
summary: Mostar (UK: /mɒˈstɑːr/,[1][2] US: /ˈmoʊstɑːr, ˈmɔːs-/;[3][4] Cyrillic: Мостар, Serbo-Croatian pronunciation: [mǒstaːr] (listen)) is a city and the administrative center of Herzegovina-Neretva Canton of the Federation of Bosnia and Herzegovina, an entity of Bosnia and Herzegovina.[5]
